ðŸ“– Summary: Pocketpy is a portable Python 3.x interpreter written in C11, designed as an alternative to Lua for game scripting. It's a header-only library with no external dependencies beyond the C standard library, making it easy to integrate into C/C++ projects. Developers can create Python bindings using C-API or pybind11 compatible interfaces.
